meanings.definition: The act of hunting game with dogs.
meanings.sent1: The coursings of the hounds excited the hunters.
meanings.sent2: The coursings of the greyhounds were impressive during the race.
meanings.sent3: The coursings of the playful puppies made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her coursings through the forest were like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The coursings of the hunting dogs echoed through the woods.

meanings.definition: The act of moving swiftly or in a zigzag course.
meanings.sent1: The coursings of the river were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The coursings of the snake through the grass were unpredictable.
meanings.sent3: The coursings of the toy car around the track were amusing.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts took unexpected coursings through his mind.
meanings.sent5: The coursings of the wind through the trees created a soothing sound.

meanings.definition: The act of pursuing or chasing something.
meanings.sent1: The coursings of the detective after the suspect were intense.
meanings.sent2: The coursings of the cheetah after its prey were swift.
meanings.sent3: The coursings of the children after the ice cream truck were comical.
meanings.sent4: Her coursings after her dreams never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The coursings of the thoughts in his mind led to a breakthrough idea.
